title: Olivia Buckland's incredible Halloween make up transforms her into cartoon Barbie
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Olivia Bowen Buckland looks completely unrecognisable as she's transformed into a cartoon Barbie.

The Love Island star, who tied the knot with Alex Bowen last year, has already won Halloween with this amazing costume.

The 25-year-old slipped into a black and white sequined playsuit and draped a fluffy pink throw around her shoulders to become the famous doll, but it was her make up that was truly incredible.

The clever contouring and bright colouration made her look completely different.

Sharing the snaps of her transformation on Instagram , she said: "Being Barbie really was the BEST DAY EVER. LIVING for this Halloween look @annalingis created on me for the @barbiestyle 60th anniversary.. #HalloweenBarbie

(Image: Instagram)

"I’m wearing the @smiffysuk Barbie limited edition costume, which recreates Barbie’s first ever outfit!

"The costume comes with a special edition deluxe striped sequin bodysuit, pink fluffy coat and sun glasses.

"Available on Amazon and Smiffys, there is a link to shop in my story!"

People couldn't get over her look.

"What the hell this is unreal," In The Style creator Adam Frisby commented.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: SOPA Images/LightRocket via Gett)

While Geordie Shore's Sophie Kasaei commented: "This is amazing"

And others dubbed her "Halloween goals"

Some fans begged to see a video of her having her make up done.

Olivia and beau Alex are set to star in their very own show on TLC, Olivia & Alex: Happily Ever After.

(Image: SOPA Images/LightRocket via Gett)

The new show documents their married life with one another and their two French bulldogs.

Alex and Olivia met on Love Island in 2016, where they came second to Cara De La Hoyde and Nathan Massey, who now have a baby together.

Alex was working as a scaffolder and Olivia was a sales executive when they shot to fame on the ITV show.

description: The Love Island star looked completely unrecognisable as her impressive make up turned her into a cartoon character
